body:
yle-dl (previous known as RTMPDump-YLE) is a command-line program for downloading media files from the two video streaming services of the Finnish national broadcasting company Yle: [Yle Areena](http://areena.yle.fi), and [Elävä arkisto](http://yle.fi/elavaarkisto/).

## Usage

``yle-dl yle_video_page_url [rtmpdump_options]``

For example:

``yle-dl http://areena.yle.fi/tv/1515302``

or

``yle-dl http://areena.yle.fi/tv/1515302 -o /your/video/dir/video.mp4``

## Download

The source code is available under [GNU GPLv2 license](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html).

[yle-dl 2.0.1](http://users.tkk.fi/~aajanki/rtmpdump-yle/yle-dl-2.0.1.tar.gz) (4.7.2012)
name: Yle-dl
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
